node_distributions.markdownDescription:
Specifies the type and priority of the Node installation that should be used for Node-based servers.

The array allows values:

- `system` - a Node distribution found on the PATH
- `local` - a Node distribution managed by LSP that doesn't affect the system

The order in which the values are specifies determines which one is tried first,
with the later one being used as a fallback.
You can also specify just a single value to disable the fallback.
